import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { useReactToPrint } from 'react-to-print'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ patientName: '', dateOfBirth: '', dateOfExam: '', chiefComplaint: '', historyOfPresentIllness: '', pastMedicalHistory: '', medications: '', allergies: '', socialHistory: '', familyHistory: '', reviewOfSystems: '', physicalExamination: '', assessment: '', plan: '', physicianName: '', physicianSignature: '' }); const formRef = useRef(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; const handlePrint = useReactToPrint({ content: () => formRef.current, }); const createNewForm = () => { setFormData({ patientName: '', dateOfBirth: '', dateOfExam: '', chiefComplaint: '', historyOfPresentIllness: '', pastMedicalHistory: '', medications: '', allergies: '', socialHistory: '', familyHistory: '', reviewOfSystems: '', physicalExamination: '', assessment: '', plan: '', physicianName: '', physicianSignature: '' }); }; return (
